text: AP-1 activation following long-term exposure of Jurkat T-cells to PMA .
Jurkat T-cells were transfected with <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reporter plasmids containing the AP-1 cis-elements .
( A ) Time - dependent AP-1 activation in response to PMA .
( B ) HK E . coli does not activate AP-1 .
( C ) Dose - dependent activation of AP-1 were performed using PMA alone ( grey bars ) and in combination with calcium ionophore ( CaI 955 muM , black bars ) .
( D ) TCR - / - deficient cells responded to PMA ( 162 nM ) by up - regulating AP-1 activity .
Statistical significance from the control was determined using Student 's t-test .
